TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SplitterCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 提供分隔器事件的資料。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#547)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#547)]

MemberSignature.Value: public SplitterCancelEventArgs (int mouseCursorX, int mouseCursorY, int splitX, int splitY);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 mouseCursorX, int32 mouseCursorY, int32 splitX, int32 splitY) cil managed
Public Sub New (mouseCursorX As Integer, mouseCursorY As Integer, splitX As Integer, splitY As Integer)
public: SplitterCancelEventArgs(int mouseCursorX, int mouseCursorY, int splitX, int splitY);

param.name: mouseCursorX
param.span: 滑鼠指標的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in client coordinates.

param.name: mouseCursorY
param.span: 滑鼠指標的 Y 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in client coordinates.

param.name: splitX
param.span: 左上角的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The X coordinate of the upper left corner of the in client coordinates.

param.name: splitY
param.span: 左上角的 Y 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: The Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the in client coordinates.

summary.span: 使用指定的滑鼠指標和 左上角的座標，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the upper left corner of the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MouseCursorX As Integer
public: property int MouseCursorX { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠指標的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: Gets the X coordinate of the mouse pointer in client coordinates.

value.span: 整數，表示滑鼠指標的 X 座標 (在工作區座標中)。

span.span: An integer representing the X coordinate of the mouse pointer in client coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#547)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#547)]
